attributes.action: send British troops to Zimbabwe to librate the Zimbabwean people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British troops were sent to Iraq against the People's will... however the British People recognise the value of liberating the Zimbabwe people from Mugabe - so why is there no discourse to despatch them to this region other than the UK and US have no oil concerns here? We the undersigned demand British troops are reassigned to bring down the Mugabe dictatorship!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
